text: Ronald Isley (born May 21, 1941) is an American recording artist, songwriter and record producer. He is the founding member and lead singer of the R&B; group the Isley Brothers. Isley received a Legend Award at the Soul Train Music Award. Isley was born in Cincinnati, Ohio. == References == Category:American R&B; singers Category:Musicians from Cincinnati Category:African-American musicians Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Singers from Cincinnati Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Writers from Cincinnati
title: Ronald Isley
